meanings.definition: The way in which one acts or conducts oneself, especially towards others.
meanings.sent1: Her behavior at the party was polite and friendly.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student's good behavior in class.
meanings.sent3: The behavior of the mischievous puppy made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The behavior of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The behavior of the car's engine indicated a problem.

meanings.definition: The manner in which an animal or person behaves in response to a particular situation or stimulus.
meanings.sent1: The dog's behavior changed when it heard thunder.
meanings.sent2: Observing the lion's behavior in the wild was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The behavior of the squirrel stealing nuts was quite clever.
meanings.sent4: The behavior of the stock market can be unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The behavior of the toddler throwing a tantrum was exhausting for the parents.
